rules_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each historic card in your graveyard. [i](Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]
Flying, deathtouch
[i]Morbid[/i] – At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a historic permanent with mana value 3 or less onto the battlefield from your graveyard.
